edu.uah.math.psol.distributions
Class CircleDistribution

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.uah.math.psol.distributions.Distribution
        |
        +--edu.uah.math.psol.distributions.CircleDistribution
public class CircleDistribution
extends Distribution

This class models the crcle distribution with parameter a. This is the distribution of X and Y when (X, Y) has the uniform distribution on a circular region with a specified radius.
